      • fitInitial

        protected GeometricCircle fitInitial​(Pnt2d[] points)
        Description copied from class: RansacCurveDetector
        Fits an initial primitive to the specified points. This abstract method must be implemented by inheriting classes, which must also specify the required number of initial points (RansacCurveDetector.K).
        Specified by:
        fitInitial in class RansacCurveDetector<GeometricCircle>
        Parameters:
        points - an array of exactly RansacCurveDetector.K points
        Returns:
        a new primitive of type T
